00629 #define FSMC_IT_RisingEdge                              ((uint32_t)0x00000008)
00630 #define FSMC_IT_Level                                   ((uint32_t)0x00000010)
00631 #define FSMC_IT_FallingEdge                             ((uint32_t)0x00000020)
00632 #define IS_FSMC_IT(IT) ((((IT) & (uint32_t)0xFFFFFFC7) == 0x00000000) && ((IT) != 0x00000000))
00633 #define IS_FSMC_GET_IT(IT) (((IT) == FSMC_IT_RisingEdge) || \
00634                             ((IT) == FSMC_IT_Level) || \
